name: Familiar Double
components: V, S, M (a small replica of you worth 5 gp)
text: This spell functions as project image, except the image appears in your familiar’s square and moves when your familiar moves.
savingThrow_zh: 意志, 通过则不相信 (若有互动)
text_zh: 该法术的功能如同投影术（Project Image）一般，不过幻象仅会出现在你的魔宠所在的空间，而且会在你的魔宠移动时跟着移动。
